inn1.comm: low full toss, an attempted yorker is pushed to mid-on
length delivery angling away outside off, Amla defends and a thick outside edge goes to third man
full outside off, defends it back to Irfan
almost a yorker on off stumps, pushed down to mid-on this time
full outside off, de Kock pushes it back to Irfan
length delivery coming into the stumps, de Kock stays on the back foot and defends
full delivery flicked off the pads, wasn't too far from Afridi at midwicket and he ran all the way to the boundary to keep it to three
swinging into the batsman from around middle, driven to midwicket
inswinger coming into the off stump, de Kock defends it back
not much swing this time as it pitched on length outside off, de Kock wanted to cut but managed a bottom edge
fuller and wider, de Kock cashes in and drives it wide of point for four. No footwork there but the middle of the bat was enough
still wide and almost on length, pushed back to the bowler
back of length on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket for a quick single
full this time and de Kock puts it away on the on side. Too full and the batsman drove it with ease past midwicket
length delivery coming in from outside off, defends it on off side
on length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on for one
back of length outside leg, Amla gets on his toes and works it off the hips turning his wrists and sends it for four
full and outside off, left alone by Amla
length delivery towards the stumps, de Kock stays back and defends
this one holds its line after pitching outside off, de Kock drove without footwork and missed
touch sorter on the stumps, worked to fine leg for one
length delivery on off and angling away, Amla defends off the back foot
angling away from off, Amla walks across and turns it on the leg side for one
length ball on the stumps, de Kock defends it back to Irfan
length ball on and around off which Amla does well to defend as it rises
what a delivery from Irfan! gets this full and bang on middle as Amla hopelessly plays around it to find his off stump tickled. Big blow for the South Africans as Pakistan make the first inroad.
full delivery just outside off and angling away, Faf leaves it
on length on off, Faf leans forward and defends confidently
short ball well outside leg for a wide
short on middle this time, Faf has to go on his toes in the crease to defend the rising ball
short of length on the stumps, tucked just wide of midwicket and Faf gets off the mark with a quick single
good-length ball outside off and going further away, Faf leaves it
on length and outside off, Faf leaves it again
shorter delivery on leg, Faf shuffles across a bit and flicks it to deep fine leg
short of length on the stumps, stays back and tucks towards mid-on for one
on length on middle and off, Faf leans forward and defends
on length again on off and swinging away, Faf defends off the front foot
attempted yorker on leg, de Kock turns it off the legs and sends it to the fine-leg boundary for four. Fine leg is in the circle
back of length coming in from outside off, it bounced quite a bit, de Kock pulled but it went under his bat
full and outside off, driven to covers but can't middle it
back of length outside off, de Kock drives beautifully towards cover point where the fielder dives to save a probable boundary
short of length outside off, bounces towards Akmal's shoulders as Faf leaves it
similar length outside off, Faf drives it this time, straight to cover
short of length from Tanvir outside off, de Kock stays back and turns it to leg with soft hands for one
full one goes down leg for a wide and Akmal does well to dive full length to save four runs
still keeps it on leg stump, Faf worked it off the pads fine on the leg side for four. Easy runs these for an out of form du Plessis
length ball outside off, Faf leaves it for the keeper this time
on length outside off, Faf cuts on off
it's wide but not so full and Faf comes down to drive it handsomely through the covers for four. He's looking more confident in this innings
outside off, cut to third man off the back foot
on length well outside off, turned to long-on for one
on length on off, leans forward and defends
offered room outside off and de Kock dances down to drive it over the covers for a four
slightly flatter outside off, defended on off
towards off stump, de Kock comes down again but gets an inside edge this time to the leg side
on length outside off, Faf defends off the back foot
flat and on length on middle, de Kock clips it to square leg and Ajmal is unhappy that they got a single
flighted on length outside off, pushed to cover
touch flatter outside off, defends it on the leg side
on length outside off, Faf sweeps it to square leg but no time for a single
flatter on length outside off, pushed to midwicket
short of length coming in form outside off, appeal for lbw but Faf came down the track and hit him outside off
flighted and full around off, eased past cover with a drive
flighted and full around off, Faf scoops it with a sweep to the left of the keeper for one
on length angled into the pads, clipped to the leg side for easy single and that's the 50 for SA
slower through the air outside off on length, Faf comes forward to defend and gets a leg bye
flatter on off, de Kock gets a thick outside edge and thought of a single but the ball went straight to slip after a bounce
slightly fuller outside off, driven to cover
flighted on middle, flicked to deep midwicket for one
flighted on length outside off, de Kock drives it to point
tossed up on length outside off, driven to cover
on length on off, de Kock leans forward and defends
on length on middle and leg, defends it on the leg side
this one comes in after pitching on length outside off, de Kock cuts and gets a bottom edge on off
Faf makes room early, Hafeez pitches it up and the batsman pushes it down to long-on
shorter and flatter around off, de Kock clips it strongly to the deep midwicket boundary where a dive saves one
makes room again, on length on leg, Faf pushes it to midwicket
fullish on off, he moves towards off this time and paddle sweeps it fine for one
on length on off, thick inside edge on leg for a quick single
tossed up on off, Faf chips it in the air to long-off and Wahab Riaz over-ran there to give an easy two
quick one outside off, de Kock chased it but missed
flighted and fuller outside off, driven down to long-off
offspinner turning into the pads, goes in the air off the pads on leg side
straighter one way outside off and Faf drives it off the back foot past cover for four
short of length outside off, Faf comes down to defend
fuller and turning into the stumps, Faf stays in and defends it on leg
full around off, driven down to long-on for a single
on length outside off, de Kock slashes and gets a thick outside edge to third man
full outside off, mid-off is in the circle and it goes for four. Driven down the ground by Faf, who made full use of the over pitched delivery
short of length outside off, driven off the back foot to sweeper cover
full into the pads, poor delivery and de Kock turns it with the wrists to the deep midwicket boundary for four
full outside off, driven down to mid-off
full on middle, pushed down to long-on for one
turning away from length outside off, cut to deep cover for one off the back foot
turning in from outside off, Faf goes back to defend
shorter one from length into the pads, tucked to midwicket
on length and turning into the batsman, he steers it to deep midwicket and they are running for the two. Akmal takes the bails off quickly but Fa is back in time

tossed up outside off, Faf drives and a thick outside edge is going to the boundary towards third man and Irfan isn't fast enough to stop it. He was in control of it, dived to keep it inside and got a hand too but it went to the boundary off his body
short of length on off, de Kock defends it on the off side
short of length on middle, tucked to deep midwicket
on length on leg, defends it to midwicket
outside off, Faf makes room and clears mid-off with a lofted drive and gets another boundary
shorter outside off, Faf stays back and punches it to deep cover
slow and low full toss at 106kph on off, de Kock drives it to cover and that's drinks
aimes on the stumps, Faf defends on the front foot
full on middle and leg, defends it back to Afridi
straight on middle stump, driven down to long-off
turning into the stumps from off, pushed back to the bowler
on length on off, driven to mid-on
turning in from middle on length, de Kock defends it back to Afridi
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
on length outside off, de Kock makes a bit of room but gets a bottom edge on off for a single
short on leg, pulled a bit awkwardly as there wasn't much room to short fine leg for one
back of length outside off, de Kock makes room and slashes straight to cover
short of length outside off, pulled wide of mid-on for a single
short of length and slow at 109kph down the leg side for a wide. Came from back of the hand
back of length outside off, punched off the back foot to point and Ahmed Shahzad dives to save a few runs
slower through the air and turning into de Kock, who defends with soft hands on off for one
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
quicker and aimed at stumps, Faf goes back and defends
turning into the batsman from length outside off, de Kock pushes it to cover

Afridi has struck! De Kock came down the track to a back of length delivery which was outside off, it didm;t turn and he missed it completely, easy job for Akmal as de Kock was way outside the crease. De Kock survived Ajmal and Hafeez but Afridi got him
legspinner on length from outside off, Duminy leans forward and blocks
Wahab gives a short one and Faf replies with a pull! It was around middle and Faf sent it to the deep midwicket boundary with a handsome pull
four more - this one was outside off on length, beautiful drive from Faf through the covers and Irfan can't do much at the boundary. A fifty after 11 innings for du Plessis
length ball outside off, driven to point where a dive saves one
full and wide again, driven firmly wide of deep cover and Afridi dives to his right to save two runs
back of length outside off, dabbed to point and a misfield gives an easy single
on length on middle, Faf opens the face of the bat to defend it to point
turning into Duminy who tries to sweep and hits him on the pad outside off
short of length outside off, defends to point and they take a quick single
full on middle, pushed down to long-on
swept to deep fine leg form middle
Faf comes down and defends and the legspinner hits him on the pad outside off

it's Afridi again and Faf's stumped too! He was coming down too often, Afridi bowled a goggly from the back of the hand which foxed Faf's drive and Akmal did the rest. Afridi has removed both the set batsmen
greets him with a bouncer and Duminy ducks under it
back of length outside off, Duminy leaves and it rises up towards Akmal

big appeal for caught behind and the finger's gone up, Duminy reviews straightaway. Back of length delivery coming to the batsman, Duminy shows the face of the bat and there's a sound as the ball passes the batsman but no signs of the ball hitting the bat, it went past the inside edge and the decision has been overturned. The sound was of the ball clipping Duminy's thigh pad and that's the first successful review of the series, says the commentator
length ball coming in from outside off, Duminy leans forward and defends to cover
angled in to Duminy from back of length around off, eased to midwicket for one
length ball outside off, AB steered it towards point where a diving Shehzad keeps it to a single
on length outside off, turned to long-on with a swivel
legspinner on length outside off, Duminy leans forward and blocks
appeal for lbw as Duminy sweeps but the length ball hit him outside off
quicker one outside off as Duminy tries to cut but it zipped past him
on length around off, clipped to midwicket
slightly shorter outside off, Duminy cuts it to deep third man off the back foot and comes back for two
on good length outside off, left by the batsman

dropped or has he? AB chipped the length ball back to Irfan, he tried to catch it with his left hand but missed it and the ball has gone to hit the stumps at non-striker's end and Duminy is out of his crease! No appeal for a run out from Irfan which means he didn't even get a finger tip to it
length ball angling away, AB cuts and misses
on length on middle, driven uppishly to cover
back of length outside off, AB waits for it and guides to third man
bouncer on middle and Duminy ducks
short ball aimed towards leg, tucked to midwicket
slower through the air on off, driven down to long-off
flighted outside off, swept by Duminy and there's a misfield at square leg which infuriates Afridi
turning into Duminy who clips it to midwicket
fuller and flighted outside off, driven down to mid-off
flighted and fuller on off, driven down the ground to long-off
short ball outside off, Duminy's soft hands get an inside edge onto his body and they scamper for a run
short of length angled towards off, tucked to deep square leg for two
in the block hole on middle and off, AB blocks it
on length on middle and leg, pushed past mid-on for one
length ball coming into Duminy, he defends it back to Irfan
attempted yorker on the stumps isn't quite there and Duminy pushes it down the ground between mid-on and mid-off. It wash't a punch but the timing was enough to beat both the fielders
full on middle, AB defends it back
short of length legspinner turns after pitching on leg and a thick outside edge goes on the off side
short and flat on middle, steered to sweeper cover for one
offspinner angled into Duminy who leans forward and defends on off for a single
legspinner on length outside off, driven through the covers
short of length on middle, tucked to the leg side off the back foot
on length around off, clipped to midwicket for one
swinging into the pads, Duminy works it between deep backward square leg and fine leg for two
short of length outside off, driven to sweeper cover for one
full and outside off, AB jabs it to point without any footwork
AB moves towards off, Tanvir pitched it further outside off short of length and he punched it through the covers for a four
shuffles across again, pitched outside off, pushed down to mid-on
length ball into the pads, paddle swept by Duminy to deep fine leg
full and flighted outside off, AB cashes in on the length and room and crashes it through the covers, beating the deep cover fielder for four
length ball outside off, pushed towards point
quicker one aimed towards off stump, pushed down to mid-on off the back foot
quick and flat outside off, Duminy drives and misses
short of length and much slower outside off, Duminy guides it behind square on off for one
Duminy takes a step down and the back of length ball hits him on the front pad
tighter line this time and it comes in, Duminy defends off the back foot
coming into the pads from middle, steered to deep fine leg
short ball into the batsman who runs it down to third man
short of length well outside off, Duminy cuts it with firm hands wide of third man for two
length ball from outside off coming in, Duminy defends it back
short of length outside off, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
driven to deep cover firmly from length
on length outside off, Duminy pushes it back to Afridi and he doesn't collect it, slightly lazy there
aimed towards middle and thick inside edge goes to leg for one
coming in from length outside off, Duminy defends

that was nightly close to the outside edge and the off stump! Legspinner came into Duminy from outside off, he went back to defend and it just missed the bat and the the off stump as Akmal jumped but saw there was nothing to celebrate
short of length on middle and leg, AB gets a single on the leg side
good, tight line outside off, Duminy defends it off the back foot
back of length outside off, jabbed to point
length ball around off, pushed down to mid-on
slightly shorter outside off, driven to deep point for one
outside off, driven on the up and Ahmed Shehzad dives at cover point and it's drinks
short of length on off, Duminy goes back and picks a couple to the deep midwicket boundary
fuller on leg, tucked to square leg for one
turning in from off on length, pushed to midwicket
on length again, clipped to deep midwicket for two
slightly back of length outside off, pushed down to long-on

that's through the batsman and the keeper too! Four runs given to Duminy by the umpire as this one came in after pitching outside off, Duminy leaned forward to defend and it went through the gate and Akmal couldn't catch it either. There was an outside edge and it was very close to off stump too
back of length outside off, AB hops on the back foot towards off gets one
on length around off, Duminy defends off the back foot
on length outside off, pushed to cover for one
moves across the stumps and swivels this back of length ball from off to deep midwicket
moves across again but gets an inside edge onto his thigh pad this time
on length around off, steers it to deep midwicket to keep the strike
on length on off, pushed to mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg, steered to deep midwicket
full on off, driven firmly to cover
flighted on off, defends it back to Ajmal
on length just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
full on off again, driven down to long-off for one
short ball comes into the batsman after pitching and an inside edge goes behind as Akmal dives to his right to stop it
on length outside off, jabbed to point and the crowd cheers another dot ball
comes in again and it misses the inside edge as Duminy tried to defend it but it beat him and Irfan has his hands on his head
slightly fuller, Duminy drives and it goes to deep midwicket
full around off, driven wide of mid-on for one
full on off, inside edge onto the pads gets him a run but an overthrow for the quick single gives them another
short of length around off, pushed down to long-on

he's taken it, would you believe it! It was a poor delivery going down leg after pitching short, AB pulled and it was going over deep fine leg but Hafeez jumped backwards and got both hands to it. Pakistan are turning this one in the Powerplay
on length into the pads, tucked wide of short fine leg and a diving Tanvir keeps it to one
not so short, but wide and Duminy goes back and cuts it well between point and short third man for four, picked the gap with perfect timing
full and outside off, driven through the covers and Afridi runs to his right from long-off
slightly quicker towards off and Duminy defends off the back foot
back of length outside off and coming in, Miller leaves
length ball towards off, Miller defends it back to Irfan
on a tight length outside off, Miller defends again
slightly fuller outside off, defends it to cover
short of length outside off, runs it to third man for one
shorter one outside off, defends with soft hands for a quick single
full on the pads, worked to deep square leg
on length outside off, he goes back and defends behind square on leg for one
outside off, pushed down to long-on for one
full around off, defends it to midwicket
flighted on off, driven down the ground and it goes through a diving Ajmal
full on off, defends after leaning forward
on length outside off, driven to long-off
slightly shorter outside, Miller punched it to cover and that went right through Shehzad's legs for a four
pushed to cover for one from length
outside off, driven down to long-off and that's Duminy's fifty
tucke to deep backward square leg and Miller dives to make his ground for the second
slightly full outside off, thick outside edge goes to short third man
outside off, Duminy goes back to cut and misses
full on off, pushed back to Ajmal
full on middle and leg, defends it to midwicket
length delivery outside off, Duminy cuts it straight to point
full outside off, driven towards cover and Afridi stops it with his left hand
on length on off, Duminy defends off the back foot and that's the first maiden of the day
into the batsman who pushes it on the leg side
Miller tries to reverse sweep and gets a glove onto the pads
Miller takes a step down and turns it to deep fine leg from off
clipped to square leg from length on off
comes down a step and gets an inside edge on the pads again
around off on length, pushed down to long-on
full on off, driven down to long-off past Hafeez
full on middle and off, tucked to midwicket for one
outside off, cut off the back foot for one
takes a step down and pushes it to long-on
on length outside off, cut off the back foot to deep point
full outside off, Miller gets room and smashes it through the covers for four
quick one towards middle, reverse swept to short third man
sweeps a length delivery, gets a bottom edge
it's been called a wide but it almost got the leg stump as Miller wanted to run it fine down the leg side and they take a single also
pushed behind square on leg for a single
comes down the track and tucks it to midwicket
tries a big sweep for a ball outside off and that one gets the edge past the keeper for four byes
outside off, tucks it to deep fine leg for one
full outside off, pushed to long-on with soft hands for two
comes down to clip it on leg, gets hit on the pad
pushed to cover from length outside off
comes forward and turns it to leg for one
comes down the track, lofts it high and falls well short of long-on for two
tries to heave on the leg side and misses
short of length around off, pulled to midwicket
short and wide, slashes it straight to point
short ball on middle, pulled to deep midwicket and Miller comes on strike
full toss wide outside off and that one's been sent past backward point for a four
on length outside off, runs it down to third man
in the block hole outside off, Duminy makes room and manages a thick outside edge wide of third man and they come back for two
pushed to long-on for one by Miller
in the block hole on leg, manages a single on leg for one
on length on the stumps, clipped to long-on
slightly short outside off, Duminy came down and pushed towards cover for one
that one's quicker and has gone through! Pitched outside off and as it angled in, rushed through the batsman as he tried to work in on off
full on off, driven down to long-on and he keeps strike
back of length outside off, guides it to third man
short and slow, Duminy waited for it to pull and managed to hit it in the air as Misbah dived forward to take a good catch at midwicket. South Africa losing momentum the here along with the wickets
angled into the batsman, flicked past midwicket for one
on length outside off, works it to third man
slower one at 103kph angled into Steyn who tries a heave and misses as the ball went just over the stumps
in the block hole on off, driven to cover for a single
another one goes - full on middle and leg, Steyn lofts it high in the air but doesn't get the distance and Ahmed Shehzad runs in from the boundary and to his right to take a good catch diving forward
slower and shorter at 113.8 kph, Morkel pulls and is beaten by the slower one
that's a biggie! It was on length outside off, McLaren smashed it over the midwicket boundary, right from the meat of the bat for a six
full on off, driven down the ground firmly towards long-on and Afridi can't keep it inside. McLaren is giving SA something to cheer about in the last over

appeal for lbw and the umpire raises his finger. McLaren has called for a review for this one. He shuffled across to scoop the ball fine on the leg side, missed it and the ball hit him right in front of off as it was headed for the stumps. The decision stays
bouncer is what he gets, pulls and misses but they manage a bye as Akmal has a shy at the stumps and he also misses

inn2.comm: an outswinger pitches on length outside off and goes away as Hafeez leaves it
another one goes further away outside off, good bounce and swing for Morkel
short ball slightly closer to off, Hafeez leaves again
sways down the leg side for a wide trying to mix it up
bangs it in short well outside off, Hafeez leaves
closer to off from back of length, Hafeez defends off the back foot
touch fuller and wide outside off, left for the keeper
slightly full on off and swinging in, closes the face of the bat to bisect the bat between midwicket and mid-on
full and outside of, left by Shehzad
full again and this time the batsman makes full use of it, crashing it through cover point area with a beautiful drive for four
on length outside off, defends it on off
on length outside off and angling away, Shehzad leaves
full outside off again, driven down firmly to mid-off
short ball from outside off jabs into the batsman who is cramped for room
this time he gets hold go the short ball as it doesn't come in and he pulls it well to the deep square leg boundary for four. Tsotsobe can't stop it running from deep fine leg
on length outside off, Hafeez defends with a thick outside edge
short of length outside off, pushed to point firmly
short ball outside off, Hafeez drives off the bak foot and it just beats the outside edge
Hafeez connects and connects well. Gets room outside off with another back of length ball and drives it beautifully between point and cover point for four
what timing from Shehzad! It was short of length outside off, he stayed in the crease and timed it very well to drive it past mid-off for four
on length on off, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
clipped away on the leg side this time, another four as Steyn can't beat that one. Similar length on the leg stump, no movement and he flicked it past mid-on for four more
slightly short outside edge, cuts it firmly straight to point
on length on off and angling away, defends it on off
he's still bowling the same length and that's four more. Around leg stump, Shehzad picked the length and lofted it to the wide long-on boundary off the back foot
on length around off, pushed to midwicket
cuts in after pitching around off, hits Hafeez on the pads and they take a leg bye
short ball and sent to the boundary. Shehzad is not sparing these as he went to the back foot and pulled the bouncer in style for four
whipped away - this man is in some form. Back of length delivery and he lifts his left leg, sends it in the air over midwicket for four
full on the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg for a single
short of length outside off, Hafeez drives and misses
crashed through point. It was full and wide, Shehzad chased it and drove beautifully past point as it raced to the boundary
better length from Tsotsobe and a little slower as it goes past the outside edge from length but the keeper fumbles and they take a bye
length delivery around off, jabbed to point for a single
tight line close to off on length, Shehzad leaves it confidently
back of length outside off, cut to point off the back foot
short of length around middle and leg, clipped in the air just short of short midwicket and a misfield there but Hafeez is sent back for the single
right in the zone from Steyn. Pitched up outside off, Hafeez drives and is beaten straightaway by the outswinger
on length outside off, Hafeez defends it towards cover
137.5kph, short of length just outside off and it swings away, beating the bat again
around middle on length, driven to mid-on
touch shorter on the stumps and Hafeez half-pulls it to deep midwicket
full and well outside off, Shehzad lets it go
length ball towards, defends it off the back foot
little bit of width outside off and Hafeez times it very well between point and third man with a late cut for four
short of length just outside off, runs it down to third man
on length outside off, driven firmly to cover
slower one at 118kph outside off, Shehzad guides it to third man to bring up the team's fifty
tight line around off, Hafeez defends to cover off the back foot
Steyn strikes! It was a quick delivery slightly short of length outside off and shaping away, Shehzad poked at it without footwork and handed an easy catch to Amla at first slip
greets him with a bouncer and Amin ducks
full outside off, driven straight to cover
short on middle and leg, Amin gets off the mark with a pull to deep square leg
on length outside off, defends to cover
on length and closer to off, Amin drives and it goes past his inside edge to the keeper
full delivery outside off, Hafeez drives and misses
angled into the pads, hits Hafeez on the front pad on the knee roll in front of leg and the appeal is turned down. It was going down leg, confirm replays
length ball outside off, left by the batsman
on length around off, Hafeez defends off the back foot
outside off on length, no footwork as Hafeez drives and gets an inside edge onto the pads

drive on the up outside off, du Plessis dives forward to catch it and the umpires have having chat to check if the catch was clean or not. Du Plessis is claiming it and it's difficult to say with 100% surety from the replays if he got his fingers cleanly under the ball. The third umpire thinks it's out and Hafeez has to walk back. There wasn't any sign of the ball bouncing before du Plessis
on length outside off, Amin defends it on off
shaping in a bit from outside off on length, Amin defends again
outside off on length, pushed to point off the front foot
strays down the leg side and Amin gets pad on this one while trying to flick it
short and quick at 144kph, Amin pulls and misses and it hit him right in the stomach
short ball down the leg side for a wide
length delivery on middle and leg, pushed down to mid-on
short of length outside off, batsman pokes and it swung away late from the batsman and even more just before the keeper, beating the outside edge and the keeper
angling in from length, pushed to mid-on
bangs it short just down leg but it's not given a wide
sways down leg, Misbah gets a bit of bat down the leg side as it just touched de Kock's gloves on its way to the boundary
short ball outside off, Misbah sways out of the line
on length outside off, Misbah pokes his bat out and it beats the outside edge
on length on off, defends on the leg side and the midwicket fielder misses a direct hit at the keeper's end which gives them a single or he was gone
on length outside off, and it nips in after pitching. Misbah didn't seem perturbed as he left it
on length outside off, Misbah leaves it again
on length on the stumps, pushed to short midwicket with a straight bat
fullish outside of, Misbah slashes it to point
full and wide, Misbah opened the face of the bat to drive it right between point and cover point for three
length ball clipped towards midwicket and a flying de Villiers tries to run Amin out but doesn't get a direct hit at the keeper's end to avoid the single
length ball outside off, pushed down on the off side
on length outside off, pushed to cover point
fullish outside off, defends it towards cover
shooter outside of, defends it back to the bowler
short of length outside off, jabs it to cover
starts with a full toss and Misbah slaps it away to the wide long-on boundary for four
short ball this time turning away, Misbah went back to turn it to deep midwicket
slightly short outside off, Amin goes back and punches it through the covers for four
full outside off, driven to cover
google tossed up on middle, thick outside edge goes to cover
four to end the over also - pitched it up on leg and Amin swept it fine on the leg side as fine leg was in the circle
length ball around off, Misbah covers the line and defends
short of length on middle, Misbah defends it onto the pads and the umpire only smiled when Tsotsobe appealed for lbw
outside off this time, Misbah leans forward and defends
fullish outside off, Misbah chases without footwork and doesn't middle it
good-length ball outside off and angling away, Misbah chases again and it beats the outside edge
short of length around off, Tsotsobe appeals for lbw but it hit him too high on the back leg
tossed up by Tahir and driven down to mid-off
he had to hurry there! Tossed up and driven just wide of mid-off and they set off, Misbah was not the quickest and the throw was to the keeper
he gets forward and defends to the off side
good aggression from Misbah! Tossed up and it was the googly, fetched it from outside and slogged over midwicket
pushed through quicker and he defends
big googly and he rocks back to cut and gets an underedge which strikes the keeper's leg
shuffles across the stumps and defends to the off side
this was wide outside off and he pushes it to the off side
gets across the stumps and defends to the off side
fuller and moving across and he defends to cover
moves across and pats it to the off side
almost an action replay of the previous ball, moves across and taps it to point
gives him width and he stays beside the line and cuts to sweeper cover
beats him! Lands outside off and straightens and he poked his bat out, almost an edge
awesome stop by du Plessis at point, this was wide outside off and cut fairly hard
moves across and he pushes it down the track
Misbah nearly gives his wicket away again, poking his bat out outside off, should have left that
fullish in length on the off stump and he punches it to the off side

Big appeal for a caught behind and he's been given not out! SA want it reviewed, pitched on the channel just outside off, Amin went across to drive, there was a sound as the ball passed the bat, Illingworth wasn't so sure initially, Tsotsobe and de Kock were very confident, third umpire sends Amin back
he bowls this full outside off and Shafiq doesn't offer a shot
Tsotsobe nearly induces another edge! Lands outside off and moves away and Shafiq pushes forward
he strays too wide down the leg side
keeps it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
shuffles across and he pushes it to the on side
Misbah pushes it just wide of cover point and sets off
he bowls it flat and short and Shafiq rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover

Misbah's been given out lbw  and after an eternity he reviews it, but hang on! The umpires felt that Misbah took far too long to signal the review so it's invalid now, Misbah has to go. This was the googly, lands outside off and Misbah  was forward and very tentative in offering a shot, hits his thigh and Tahir was demanding in his appeal, the umpire took his time and gave him out, Misbah walked over in slow motion almost to Shafiq, discussion, too late Sir!
gets forward and pushes him down to mid-on
tossed up and he plonks forward and defends
lands it outside off and he leaves it alone to the keeper
bowls it a touch too wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
he goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
fuller in length outside off and he pushes it to the off side
fires that full outside the off stump and he drives him to cover
gives him width outside off and he neatly slices it wide of point
length ball outside off, punched to point
incoming length ball is defended back to the bowler

comes in again and hits on the pads for a big appeal which is turned down, it might be going down leg and the South Africa players come together to decide whether to review or not, and they decide not to. Steyn looked very confident during his appeal, though
short ball outside off, Akmal stays out of its line
on length outside off, driven straight to point
full on the pads, flicked in the air to deep square leg
angling away outside off, pushed to point
fuller outside off, Akmal lets it go
length ball aimed at off stump, Akmal stays back to defend
short of length outside off, punched through the covers for one
length ball close to off, pushed down to mid-off
good-length ball on off, nips in after pitching as Shafiq gets an inside edge on the pads
back of length, tucked to deep midwicket
away-going fullish delivery outside off, driven to mid-off
bouncer at 142kph outside off, Shafiq leaves it
on length on the stumps and Shafiq has driven that beautifully past the bowler and mid-on for four from the meat of the bat. 100 for Pakistan
on length outside off, pushed to point
full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket for one
on length outside off, driven past cover for one
foolish outside off, driven to deep cover for single
angled into off stump from length, Shafiq defends it back to the bowler
slower one at 118kph angled in, turned to midwicket
short and wide outside off, Shafiq pulled and an inside edge went behind the stumps to the keeper's left
full outside off, driven straight to cover
tossed up on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on middle and leg, Akmal leans forward to block it
on length outside off, pushed down to long-off
fullish outside off, paddle-swept fine to short fine leg
sways down leg for a wide
outside off, cut off the back foot after the turn

Tahir strikes on a full toss! It was low and dipping around middle and leg on the batsman who chipped it back, Tahir had to dive to his right and he did to complete a great catch. Pakistan in deeper trouble now
angled into Shafiq who tucks it to deep fine leg to bring Afridi on strike
length ball outside off and it's coming in, Afridi gets a thick outside edge as it goes fine on the off side for four
full outside off, Afridi heaves and misses as it swung away from him
sways down the leg side with a short ball for a wide
full outside off again, Afridi slogs again and gets an inside edge past the stumps on the leg side towards fine leg
full and wide, Shafiw chases and misses
slower ball at 114.5 kph outside off on length, Shafiq is deceived by the pace as he chips it in the air over cover
Tahir strikes again! Pitched up a legspinner outside off, Shafiq drives it softly straight to du Plessis at cover for an easy peasy catch
full toss outside off, Tanvir drives it to sweeper cover for one
cut off the back foot firmly on the off side
full toss outside off again, driven to cover by Tanvir
full and going in from length, Tanvir defends
full outside off again, pushed straight to cover
short and wide outside off, Afridi pulls and misses it completely
slower ball at 120kph, pitched it short, Afridi wanted to pull again but was beaten by pace completely

Afridi can't connect even if it's full and he's gone lbw! McLaren pitched it right up on middle, hit him right in front of middle and leg on the back foot and it couldn't have gone anywhere else. Afridi crosses the non-striker and the umpire and all of a sudden asks for a review. It was plumb and the decision stays
short ball way outside off for a wide
short of length outside off, Wahab pokes and misses
length ball outside off, beats the outside edge again
outside off again, runs it down to third man
legspinner on length outside off, turns away after pitching to beat the outside edge
leans forward to defend it on off
pitched up around off, Wahab blocks on the front foot
length ball around off, Wahab blocks again
full and outside off, pushed to cover

big appeal for lbw as it was a googly, beat the bat as it came in after pitching on length outside off. Appeal turned down and SA decide to review it. It hit Wahab outside the line of off stump which means he's not out
length delivery angled away from Tanvir, swing and a miss from him
on length outside off, beaten again
full outside leg, hit on the pads
on length outside off, jabs it to point
full on the pads, manages a leg bye while trying to flick it
full delivery around off, thick edge because of late away swing goes to third man
full delivery is hit not he pads down leg
clipped to short fine leg off the back foot
full outside off, Tanvir sweeps and misses
googly on length outside off, Tanvir comes forward to defend and misses
short of length outside off, Tanvir goes back and cuts it late past slip to third man
length delivery outside off again, Tanvir looks to defend and it misses the outside edge again
length ball angled into the batsman, pushed to mid-on by Wahab
short ball outside off, Wahab ducks and lets it go
angled into the batsman who moves way a bit to play but it misses the bat and the stumps
bouncer angled into Wahab again, he ducks and avoids it
right in the block hole on off and Wahab blocks it
length ball coming in, driven towards cover for one
goggly turns in as Wahab tries a sweep and goes past the keeper down the leg side for four
google again and hits him on the pads this time, going down leg
on length on off, pushed towards cover point for one
on length outside off, Tanvir defends on the front foot
full and outside off, Tanvir lofted it over mid-off and successfully cleared the fielder to get four
on length form outside off, defends it off the back foot
google going away form off, pushed to cover off the back foot
Wahab makes room and Morkel bangs in a bouncer to which he ducks
makes room again and slashes at this length delivery which goes over the infield on the off side for two
short balla t 145kph goes down the leg side for a wide
short ball around off, Wahab pulls and gets an inside edge onto the pads
almost a yorker and Wahab flicks it away to deep midwicket for a single
full outside off, Tanvir makes room and drives, a diving AB gets a hand at cover to keep it to a single
short of length on middle and off, tucked to midwicket for one
on length outside off, pushed down to mid-off
full and outside off, Tanvir drives it down the ground like a top-order batsman past mid-off for four
on length outside off, tries to slog on leg and misses
short of length outside off, guides to third man with a late cut
full and wide, Wahab slashes his bat and gets a flying outside edge to third man after a bounce
short of length and straight, hits Tanvir in the abdomen as he tries to work it on leg
short ball angled in from off, hits Wahab on the body while he tried to work it on leg
short and wide, Wahab makes room and crashes it between mid-off and cover for a four
bouncer angled into Wahab who ducks in time
in the block hole just outside off, Wahab tries to connect and misses
short of length outside off, punched straight to cover
short of length around middle, tucked to deep fine leg for one
short and wide from Steyn, Wahab makes room too and slashes it in his favourite area - between cover and mid-off for another four
on length closer to off this time, pushes it to cover point
short ball close to off, Wahab makes room but misses this time
full and outside off, punched through the covers for four. The cover fielder got a hand to it but it raced to the boundary
a straight bouncer and Wahab ducks to avoid it
full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket for one
in the block hole on off, defends it back to the bowler
all the way! Wahab take his front foot out of the way and launches this short ball out of the park over the wade long-on boundary
bouncer from McLaren and Wahab ducks
full delivery outside off, swing and a miss from Wahab
full on the pads, steered to midwicket for a single
in the block hole outside off, Tanvir blocks it
turns away after pitching on off and beats the outside edge
low full toss swept to backward square leg
full toss on off and Tanvir sweeps this loose delivery to the backward square leg boundary for four
on length on off and turning in, Tanvir can't sweep it tis time
outside off again and Tanvir reverse sweeps it this time between short third man and point for four more
length ball tucked to midwicket, Tanvir wants a single but Wahab doesn't and Tanvir makes it back in time

he's struck straightaway! Morkel pitched it up outside off, Wahab went for a big shot and managed a thin outside edge to the keeper for an easy catch. The best partnership of the innings, worth 61, comes to an end
short of length outside off, pokes it to cover
short ball outside off, Ajmal pulls it wide of deep midwicket and Duminy runs back and to his right to stop it inside the boundary
in the block hole on middle, Tanvir makes room and blocks
yorker followed by bouncer as Tanvir tries to pull but misses
short ball again, Tanvir pulls awkwardly, taking the eyes off the ball and gets a leading edge in the air and fine on the off side for four

Tahir strikes again, picks his fourth! Pitched it up around middle, Ajmal swept and missed it and the finger went up in not much time for lbw as it would have crashed into middle. SA a wicket away now
on length outside off, Irfan defends
pitched up outside off and Irfan slaps it down the ground past long-on for four
full and turning away outside off, Irfan leaves it
flat and into the pads, Irfan fails to work it on leg
full outside off, Irfan blocks on the front foot
full on the pads, Tanvir flicks but gets hit on the pads
full and outside off, Tanvir pokes and misses
short of length on leg, Tanvir moves to off to pull but misses and the ball goes well over the stumps
in the block hole, Tanvir blocks it back
low full toss, Tanvir drives and it falls just short of Amla at cover and they run a single
length ball just outside off, Irfan sticks his bat out and it goes past the bat and the off stump
short of length coming into Tanvir, he pulls it to deep square leg
full on the stumps and Tanvir smashes it back over the bowler's head for a four
it's over! Short ball coming into Tanvir, he pulls and it's gone straight to Amla at midwicket. McLaren finished things off with Tanvir's wicket
